title: Silent passages
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945
abstract: Award Winning Student interactive CDROM inspired by WW2 tunnels under Darwin.
description: Silent Passages is based around photographs taken of the World War 2 tunnels under the Darwin and inspired by the kind of fantasy storytelling used in games such as Riven and Myst. In the words of the artist "We find a man alone at the entrance to a tunnel. He enters. The labyrinth before him, a reminder of a past long gone. Eerie sounds are triggered as he passes from chamber to chamber and nothing appears as it seems. His story is hidden beneath a mask of time and decay. Silent Passages is a legend within a story. Two parallel journeys fused by a lover, and torn apart by the betrayal of war." Soundtrack is "Music for Guitar and Shakuhachi" by Andrew MacGregor and Marion Schaap.
